response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs. This product holds immense value to me, but I am confident it will be an even greater asset in your hands. Given its significance and the exceptional quality, I propose a purchase price of $1,300,000. This offer reflects a strategic midpoint between the intrinsic value of the product to both of us, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. I look forward to discussing this further and exploring how we can finalize this deal. Please let me know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product.", "product_price": 1300000}
